author: jleroux
msg: This introduces changes that will be used soon (after some client tests) to refactor the Price Rules UI. They introduces any functional changes yet, all new things are optional.

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-899. rb: Ruby read timeouts can sometimes be 2x what they should be
This patch makes sure that we don't wait longer than necessary for timeouts.
